nhr.name: Holovach Nazariy
nhr.description: I'm a web developer who enjoys experimenting with new ideas, learning as I go, and building projects that feel fun and satisfying to use. I like keeping things simple, clean, and easy to understand.

vpm.name: Viktoriia Pitsan
vpm.description: I'm a web developer specializing in creating responsive, user-friendly web interfaces. I am passionate about enhancing user experience by building well-crafted, accessible, and intuitive web solutions.

mkm.name: Kramarchuk Marina
mkm.description: I love turning ideas into functional and stylish web interfaces. I enjoy working in a team, learning new technologies, and making products more comfortable and intuitive for users.
